welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hinsdale, the charming city known for its picturesque streets, historic homes, and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Midway Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Midway Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Midway Airport, primarily serving Southwest Airlines flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Delta Air Lines and Air Canada.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines and several other airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dupage County Airport offers a variety of services and amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gary/Chicago International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Gary/Chicago International Airport is responsible for handling all air freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
